title: Honor tier 0
body: So the title pretty much says it all, i have had honor 0 for about 4 months i think now. I got it first after 10 game chat restriction 5 months ago and a month after I got another one without reaching back tier 1 now it has been 4 months without restrictions or bans, i have been honored regulary and haven't flamed. My question is how long it takes to get back tier 1 and tier 2 im kinda frustrated i wanna play competitive but i can't see the progress, how far im with my climb back to honor 1. I play an average of 2 or 3 games a day on weekends 8.  Im looking for any information and help about it!

replies.body: I think it still will takes some time, but there are no exact amounts of games/honors /...   you need.

This is about right. There isn't any set amount of time or games you need to play to get those restrictions lifted and start ranking up again, you simply need to show consistent reform from the behaviors that warranted the punishment to begin with.
